website_summaries.verdict: Portable defibrillator certified by the American Heart Association.
pros: Comes with one set of adult electrodes and one battery
We love that this device has a carrying case, making it portable
cons: Does not work well for some

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: With CPR training and Hands On Defib training this unit is an idea addition to our camper when traveling and at home. The pads used in this unit are identical to the professional units our local EMT and ambulance services use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Amadio

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very User Friendly and easy to use. Everyone in our office watched the online video. We had the unit sitting near a window. The unit started beeping, and I believe the battery may have over heated, so I reset the battery and put the AED in another location and the unit appears to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Well designed AED unit
customer_reviews.text: Very thoughtful design - simple to use, easy-to-follow instructions, loud and clear voice prompts, etc. I purchased multiple units.
customer_reviews.author: rocknrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how cheap these have become. Every business should have one.
customer_reviews.author: FLOYD

customer_reviews.title: Good unit reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Bought the unit after a major heart attack. AED saved my life. This unit is a high quality unit. Its simple to use and can handle both adults and children. What I like about the unit it has a button that walks you thru CPR for adults and children. They are two different intensities and the command voice the unit contains is very clear. In addition, if you ever need it to save someone in defib or arrest, just hit the button and it tells you exactly what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great machine with a FANTASTIC company for support.
customer_reviews.text: I had a great experience working with the company. They were extremely friendly, quick and helpful with a very small issue that I had. The machine is great and will be very helpful if we ever have a need. Several people in our organization have been trained by the American Red Cross and this is just like the one the instructor used.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and hopefully we will not have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately I have not had occasion to use this product
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I have not had occasion to use this product, however it appears to be very well made and very easy to use. I hope I never need it but I am confident of it's utility in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Vollman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and luckily have not had to use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Luckily we have not had to use this but we assume it is a great piece of equipment... The case works well for storage.
customer_reviews.author: mary ferguson

customer_reviews.title: They seem like sturdy units and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Our business ordered 2 of these units for emergency preparedness. They seem like sturdy units and easy to use. God willing, we will never have a need to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: aed defibrillators for sale
customer_reviews.text: If a person has a SCA, they need cpr and aed. If an aed is not there...they only have a 5% chance of surviving, even with good cpr, if an emt or paramedic does not arrive within 8 minutes. Buy all brands of aeds including Philips, Zoll, Cardiac Science, Samaritan and Defibtech at [...] They include free shipping and accessories on all aed's.
customer_reviews.author: cpr and aed training

product_meta.title: Philips HeartStart OnSite Defibrillator AED with Red Slim Carry Case 1/EA
product_meta.description: The Philips Onsite HS1 AED comes ready-to-rescue and easy-to-use. Features: On-demand CPR coaching to provide guidance during resuscitation Quick shock feature delivers shock after the end of CPR Convertible into a non-shocking AED trainer with training pads
feature_bullets: Philips HeartStart OnSite AED with 8-yr guarantee
Philips Slim Carry Case, Rescue Ready Kit
1 set of HS1 Adult Electrodes and 1 Battery
